name: Development Team
description: Build features end-to-end with frontend, backend, and testing

project.name: Build Todo App Feature
project.description: Demo project for development team workflow

tasks.title: Design user login form UI
tasks.description: Create a responsive login form with email and password fields. Include validation and loading states.

tasks.title: Build authentication API endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/auth/login endpoint with validation, JWT token generation, and error handling.

tasks.title: Write tests for login flow
tasks.description: Create unit tests for both frontend components and backend API. Include success and error cases.
